title: To all the people who choose Support in the new Dynamic Que because they want to...

replies.body:
And to all the people who pick support so that they can get into a game faster, then abandon the role in champ select... 

https://media.giphy.com/media/DuaK1bQ8CbARi/giphy.gif

{{champion:43}}: Mid or feed

{{champion:1}}: But you chose supp-

{{champion:43}}: MID OR FEED!!!
In your mind you are doing this: http://memesvault.com/wp-content/uploads/Angry-Meme-11.png

https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=https://secure.static.tumblr.com/d2c10dc3000c24e9d0a001d3775683bc/4gimycg/H9Nn7mufs/tumblr_static_tumblr_static_bxt3d1v0a1kc4448o8gwk0csc_640.gif&imgrefurl=http://www.pokecommunity.com/showthread.php?t%3D356011&h=270&w=480&tbnid=iPLkzw0ji33rYM:&docid=sMAfzVLHg75_dM&itg=1&hl=en&ei=xt_kVvrtGpS6jwOJxh4&tbm=isch&ved=0ahUKEwj66Ka83bzLAhUU3WMKHQmjBwAQMwgdKAAwAA

(I still don't know how to post images so I'm just posting links via google...rip)

1. go to the picture you want to post
2. right click
3. Copy **image location ** (not link)
4. Paste the url(?) you got directly in your post
5. wait for sometime your image will appear
or
6. If it doesn't appear check the url you pasted. If there is no .gif, .png or .jpg, add it at the end. This should get your picture to show up

right click it then choose "View Image" copy paste the resulting url.

Result: https://secure.static.tumblr.com/d2c10dc3000c24e9d0a001d3775683bc/4gimycg/H9Nn7mufs/tumblr_static_tumblr_static_bxt3d1v0a1kc4448o8gwk0csc_640.gif
Pick {{champion:223}} or{{champion:34}}  support then and troll them for the rest of their miserable game

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SCLA80Jeh44&index=13

We do try our best. We appreciate the thanks!

we appreciate your service to the people of LoL
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/adventuretimewithfinnandjake/images/7/7d/Chuck_Norris_salute.gif/revision/latest/window-crop/width/200/x-offset/0/y-offset/26/window-width/357/window-height/179?cb=20130209115619
Thanks! I just don't support as often as the support mains. But its definitely one of my preferred roles. Mid being my #1 spot.

This is my support {{champion:267}}.  There are many like it, but this one is mine.

My support is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life.

Without me, my support is useless. Without my support, I am useless. I must treat my support good. I must treat her better than my enemy who is trying to kill me. I must ult him before he ults me. I will...

My support and I know that what counts in matches is not the kills we get, deaths we suffer, nor the assists we acquire. We know that it is the kindness that counts. We will win...

My support is human, even as I, because it is my life. Thus, I will learn it as a sister. I will learn its weaknesses, its strength, its skills, its builds, its playstyle and its preferences. I will keep my support happy and ready, even as I am happy and ready. We will become part of each other. We will...

Before God, I swear this creed. My support and I are the defenders of **our** lane. We are the masters of **our** enemy. We are the saviors of my life.
So be it, until victory is bots and there is no enemy, but peace!

-Attack Damage Carry's Creed

OH MY GOD!
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/9c/9c8b5133593820e28ca22a1d0f9f2c4a7d27e2e96684787b0df393d4e2a38c20.jpg

This is the sign of a truly kind ADC! WE LOVE YOU!
**I love you all too! More than you think!**

EVERY AD CARRY NEEDS TO SIGN THIS CREED BEFORE CHOOSING TO MAIN ADC!

If they don't...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Just a warning though if I ever support you: I like to deal damage... http://www.justmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/guilty.gif What damage items? YOU DON'T SEE ANY! {{item:2301}} {{item:3060}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3050}} {{item:3001}} *tries to hide them*

So I kinda like damage dealing supports... {{champion:25}} (GUILTY OF ACCIDENTALLY TAKING KILLS! I ONLY WANTED TO LOCK THEM DOWN WITH MY DAMAGE DEALING CC SO IT WOULD BE A QUICK EASY KILL FOR YOU! Just one example.)

I am fine with damage dealing supports. I played a game with a lux that went 4 and 2. But it was okay because she also helped everyone else with her stuns that gave us kills and her shields that  saved our lives.

AP does serious wonders on some supports right? You thought a health tank {{champion:16}} with {{item:3083}} was bad? HA! Watch how much one heal does with actual AP in her build! {{item:2301}} {{item:3060}} {{item:3050}} {{item:3041}} (25 stacks){{item:3158}} {{item:3026}}
Am I the only one who finds Support fun ._.
chimes~

Making sure your ADC gets fed, Vision control, Peeling off troublesome players so your team wins every team fight, Saving your entire team by sacrificing yourself?

Playing support is easily the most fun role to play! :D

> [{quoted}](name=JHTurian,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ApbugAg3,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-03-13T03:06:00.985+0000)
>
> Making sure your ADC gets fed, Vision control, Peeling off troublesome players so your team wins every team fight, Saving your entire team by sacrificing yourself?
> 
> Playing support is easily the most fun role to play! :D

^^^^^^
Its definitely the most fun role to play.

> [{quoted}](name=JHTurian,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ApbugAg3,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-03-13T03:06:00.985+0000)
>
> Playing support is easily the most fun role to play! :D

_This I can confirm_, playing Top/Mid/ADC is just trying to out play your opponent, Jungle is keep an eye on what lane is losing and farming, while support you have to make those picture perfect skill shots, and time your skills just right, **The best times are when your ADC gets Penta ulted, and you still win the 2v5**

indeed, I play bard mostly so getting my mid and jg fed is also included in that. If my top actually uses his TP then i kind of get my whole team fed.

Been a few occasions playing bard where i literally went around getting every lane fed. I would get a stun and double kill for my adc bot. Roam mid calling jg for a mid kill then sometimes if i had time go top to finish off the full rounds.

I dropped to bronze 1 (first time) in S6 and am carrying myself back to gold mainly using support. Its surprising how much you can influence a game as support. Especially at lower elo.

You still sacrifice yourself for other people?

Adorable.
not if your adc is just busy farming bot and the entire enemy team ganks him
Nothing frustrates me more than picking leona then ending up with an adc who wants to farm...
nah i love a good bard/thresh/nami game. I've actually been trying to carry myself back to gold and had to switch to support for it to start working.
:D
Are you a Shiny Bidoof?
Sorry you cannot capture it. You're out of pokeballs

When I want to support, I literally just put Support Primary and whatever the fuck else; the other role doesn't matter.

I do enjoy me some Braum though, fun shit.

{{champion:201}}
**"Shields bring people together, walls only keep us apart."**
When does he say that?i haven't heard him.sometimes i wish riot would increase how often champions said their quotes.....

> [{quoted}](name=EmperorGilgamesh,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ApbugAg3,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2016-03-13T18:03:30.328+0000)
>
> When does he say that?i haven't heard him.sometimes i wish riot would increase how often champions said their quotes.....

I made that quote up, said it to a Yasuo.
I don't always choose support fill, but when I do... I get anything but support.

We salute you, willing supports:

https://youtu.be/_txt7yJWGCg?t=1m7s
aw, thanks babe!
you are against the sun and you have a project leona icon. Makes sense
...its so my enemies know they are facing against the sun :/
Lol, you're welcome, just don't let Leona Mains see you XD
I AM A LEONA MAIN (changed my name, I cant deal with being called a heretic cause people misunderstood my name anymore)
https://media.giphy.com/media/4EBiDm27Q2GPK/giphy.gif

I think
http://i.imgur.com/BRWryxY.png
Would fit better here.

I don't like being called kiddo.

R.I.P Teambuilder.
You are dearly missed... ;-;

That was bait.
I thought the dots meant that you were going to finish that statement with something like this:

"because they want to...


reduce queue times.
[demeaning gif here]"

People that support because they want to are the best though.
I just pick support because I don't know how to do anything else >.>
me too, and it works! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I see your name, and.... I'm guessing we main the same champ, then?

{{champion:89}} main here, and seeing this made my heart warm up ten fold. 
Thank you for appreciating us Support mains, and we love you in return kind sir.
Most choose support because they don't want to wait 10 minutes.
or cause we actually want to support :/
